co.paralleluniverse.common.io.Persistable

  • Packages that use Persistable 
    Package Description
    co.paralleluniverse.common.io

    • Uses of Persistable in co.paralleluniverse.common.io

      Subinterfaces of Persistable in co.paralleluniverse.common.io 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  VersionedPersistable
      A Persistable that is used by some persistence service that provides automatic versioning.
      Methods in co.paralleluniverse.common.io that return Persistable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Persistable Persistables.persistable(ByteBuffer buffer)
      Converts a ByteBuffer into a Persistable.
      static Persistable Persistables.persistable(Streamable streamable)
      Converts a Streamable into a Persistable.

      void Store.get(long id, short nodeHint, Persistable object)
      Retrieves a given data item into a Persistable, using a hint as to its owner in the cluster.
      If the item is indeed found on the hinted node, the retrieval performance might be superior.
